title: [The Lighthouse, Stairwell]
description: A platform fashioned from iron and timbers marks the halfway point of the stairwell.  Muffled sounds of conversation seem to come from behind a modwir door and echo around the stairwell chamber.  A small window opposite a brass-framed alcove provides a vantage point that overlooks the bay.
